library(glue)
library(rlang)
library(yaml)
library(purrr)
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)

make_slide_link <- function(N=lab){
    s <- glue("Lecture #{sprintf('%02d', N)}")
    class <- read_csv("key_dates.csv") |>
                filter(`Course Element` == "Class Session",
                       str_detect(Details, s)) |>
                pull(`Item Number`)
    
    sprintf("# [Slides](../slides/slides%02d.qmd)", class)
}
